New Records: Maxwell equalled the record for the most T20 international centuries with his fifth hundred
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell struck a blistering unbeaten 120 off 55 balls featuring eight sixes and 12 fours
West Indies finished on 207-9 in response
Australia posted 241-4, their highest Twenty20 total on home soil
Miscellaneous Highlights: Maxwell brought up his half-century off 25 balls and then symmetrically reached his ton off precisely 50
He slapped Romario Shepherd through the covers to reach three figures
Marcus Stoinis finished the pick of the home sideâ€™s attack with 3-36
There was a bizarre incident where last man Alzarri Joseph appeared to be run out, but on-field umpire Gerard Abood said there had been no appeal
